meanings.definition: A person who has celiac disease.
meanings.sent1: Many celiacs have to avoid gluten in their diet.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the symptoms of celiac disease to the celiacs in the support group.
meanings.sent3: At the gluten-free bakery, the celiacs joked about their intolerance to wheat.
meanings.sent4: In a world of bread and pasta, celiacs are like warriors fighting against gluten.
meanings.sent5: The celiacs formed a club to share recipes and support each other in their gluten-free journey.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of celiac disease.
meanings.sent1: The celiacs-friendly menu at the restaurant made dining out easier for those with gluten intolerance.
meanings.sent2: Her celiacs-friendly kitchen was equipped with gluten-free ingredients and utensils.
meanings.sent3: The celiacs-themed party featured only gluten-free snacks and treats.
meanings.sent4: The celiacs awareness campaign aimed to educate the public about gluten sensitivity.
meanings.sent5: The celiacs support group provided a safe space for sharing experiences and tips on living gluten-free.
